DOC.brief_title: Assessing Engagement Transgender Other Gender Minority Youth Across HIV Continuum Care
DOC.detailed_description: The ultimate goal study assess engagement TGMY across HIV Continuum Care . This accomplished transformative multiphasic mixed-methods research study engage site ATN network collect data internal external source regard facilitator barrier affect TGMY 's engagement across HIV Continuum Care . Empirical theoretical model produce guide future development HIV-related intervention TGMY ( publish study team peer-reviewed literature ) . In addition , finding translate immediate provider-focused recommendation multi-media resource provide concrete guidance tool apply across socio-ecological level promote full inclusion TGMY various stage HIV Continuum Care . The production multidisciplinary provider-focused material support delivery gender affirm appropriate HIV care TGMY alignment many contemporary view translational research immediate impact ability provider AMTU site elsewhere provide HIV-related care TGMY across full HIV Continuum Care . The research design incorporate element sequential design ( secondary data analysis ATN 039 ATN 086/106 influence development measure primary data collection ) convergent parallel design ( concurrent collection analysis qualitative quantitative primary data combine address specific aim . This design consider transformative mixed-methods design due study 's theoretical conceptual ground Bioecological Systems Theory ( BST ) , Gender Affirmation , Gender Minority Stress , focus advance need underrepresented marginalized population . Mixed method study typically involve collect analyze data derive quantitative qualitative data source order gain great insight research problem would gain use one two method isolation . By combine method , limitation bias inherent one single methodology lessen use multiple form data collection . The qualitative phase study use phenomenological investigative approach , help understand sociocultural behavior , language , role , interaction within culture-sharing group ( i.e. , TGMY ) triangulation qualitative data quantitative data strengthens validity information receive use combination data source .

Received least one HIV related service ( e.g. , medical care , social service , case management , etc . ) AMTU elsewhere six month prior consent ; Does identify solely sex assign birth ( may identify trans , transgender , trans woman , trans man , man , woman , gender nonconforming , genderqueer , gender , long current gender identity and/or expression match sex assign birth ) ; Self report HIVinfected ; Self report age 1624 year inclusive time consent ; Ability understand write spoken English ; Willingness participate indepth facetoface qualitative interview gender minority identity personal experience seek service across HIV Continuum Care ; Willingness participate webbased quantitative survey gender minority identity personal experience seek service across HIV Continuum Care ; Able understand willing provide sign informed consent applicable study participation . Health Care Social Service Providers To consider eligible enrollment , individual must meet criterion list . Fits one follow category : ( 1 ) medical provider ( physician , nurse , nurse practitioner , physician 's assistant ) ; ( 2 ) mental health professional ( psychologist , psychiatrist , clinical social worker , counselor ) ; ( 3 ) case manager/care coordinator ; ( 4 ) HIV test counselor ; ( 5 ) health educator/outreach worker ; Provides service one 14 AMTU elsewhere within AMTU city ; Currently work directly formerly work directly TGMY .
